name: bread
long: A rather stale looking loaf of bread.

name: fountain
long: This is the legendary Midgaard water fountain.  Truly majestic.

name: Short Sword
long: A dull-looking short sword with a hilt wrapped in worn leather.

name: Tattered Buckler
long: A round wooden buckler that looks like it's seen heavy use.

name: Leather Helmet
long: This leather helmet is more likely to give you a headache from wear than stave off a heavy blow, but it does offer some minimal protection.

name: Pot Pie
long: Calling this a pot pie is an insult to pot pies.  This is one piece of chicken with some potatos and carrots wrapped in some questionable crust.

name: Burlap Sack
long: An over-used burlap sack with many tears.
